front.title: Redistribute Route Originator Extend TLV for BGP-LS

abstract.t: This document describes one TLV extended for BGP-LS to transfer the originator of redistributed routes in order to let the SDN controller to deduce the network topology automatically under the multi-domain environments. This extension can expand the usage of BGP-LS protocol to multi- domain; enable the network operator to collect the connection relationship between different domains and then calculate the overall network topology automatically based on the information provided by BGP-LS protocol.
